Data.title: SHOLAWAT BUSYRO
Data.lyrics:
Allahumma Sholli wa sallim ala sayyidina
muhammadin sohibil busyro
sholatan tubassiruna bihaa
wa ahlana wa awlaadanaa
wa jamiia masyakhinaa
wa muallimiinaa wa tholabatanaa wa tholibatinaa
min waumina hadza ilaa yaumil akhiroh

Data.title: BILQURANI
Data.lyrics:
Bil qurani saamdhi
Aj-lu khobatsal ardhi
Huwa nafli huwa fardhi
Wa minal ayati sana faidh


Saua hidu ya maula
Filan lala qoula
Nashru kitabi aula
wa sayablughu biddunya thoula

An miladil mabrus
Sajjil tari khoujudi
Min badi hayatil burr

Data.title: TAWASSUL
Data.lyrics:
Ya Robbana Ya Ghoffar Aqbil Sujudana
Warhamna Warzuqna Warfadarojatina
Iyyaka iyyaka natawassalu alaika
Innaka innaka Innaka ala kulli syaiin qadir


Ibadallah Ibadalah rijalallah
rijalallah, Aghitsuna, Aghitsuna li-ajlillah
Wa kunu aunana lillah
Asa nahdho bifadl-lillah


Kuatkanlah iman kami
Kuatkan taqwa kami
Berilah rahmat untuk kami
Angkatlah derajat kami


Iyyaka iyyaka natawassalu alaika
Innaka innaka innaka ala kulli syaiin qadir

Data.title: YA SAYYIDI
Data.lyrics:
Yaa Sayyidi Yaa Rasulallaah
Yaa man lahul jaahu indallaah

Innal musii-iina qod ja-uuk
Lidz-dzanbi yastaghfiruunallaah


Ya sayyidar-rusli Haadinaa
Hayya bighaarah ilainal-an
Yaa Himmatas-saadaatil aqthaab
Ma’aadina-shidqi was-sirri


Hatiku yang resah
Imanku yang goyah
Berilah hidayah
Bila hamba salah


Allaahu yaa Rohman
Allaahu yaa Rahim
Allaahumma Shalli’alaihi wasallim

 

Astaghfirullaah rabbal baraayaa
Astaghfirullaah minal khatayaa
